title: Productivity Tuesday Ep#4 -- Authy Two Factor Authentication
tags: how to setup authy for the first time
description: In this video, We have discussed Authy -- the popular two-factor authentication app.    [Video Timestamps]  What is Authy  0:29 How to setup Authy  2:32 How to add Google Account to Authy 4:08   [Other Videos in productivity Tuesday Series]     [Useful links]  Download Authy for iOS   Download Authy for Android   Download Authy for MAC    List of website that supports 2FA   [Blog post]  Authy vs Google Authenticator and How secure is Authy    How to Enable 2 Factor Authentication on WordPress   [List of service Authy Support]  Google account Dropbox Facebook Microsoft account GitHub Teamviewer Kickstarter IFTTT Discord EA Origin account Discord Patreon LastPass Humble Bundle Twitch Evernote  [Resources]  I use Audio from YouTube audio library.
